text: Hianagi agigomo tarefi hatna hu'nesigeno azanku'afinti revrino'ma nonesia zaga, ete azanku'afinti revrino nenesia zagama agigomo hatna osu'nesiana onetfa hiho. Hagi kemorine, rebitine, havefima nemania varenena onetfa hiho. Na'ankure zamagra azanku'zmia huzamante nege'za revriza nenazanagi, tarefina zamagigomo'za hatnara osu'neanki'za agrua osu'naze.
